name: Baby Massage Oil
description:
I formulated this specifically for my son who was a very fussy infant, a massage after his bath helped him calm down for bedtime. Use for infant massage, cradle cap, perineal massage before labor. Contains Apricot Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Lavender Oil, Olive Oil, Chamomile Oil, Vitamin E - full ingredient list below No fragrance has been added and special attention has been paid to ensure that Nature Nurture products do not have strong scents. Paraben free. 18 month shelf life.

Amber glass jar with dropper contains 60 ML or 2 OZ.

Ingredients/Ingrédients: Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower infused Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Chamomile Essential Oil, Tocopherol (vitamin E) 
*Certified Organic

name: Sitz Bath Concentrate
description:
This liquid Sitz Bath Concentrate is an essential item to have on hand after labor and childbirth. Helps to reduce swelling, slow bleeding and ease discomfort. Pour 30 ML or 1 OZ into a gallon of warm water. Makes 4 baths. Paraben free. 12 month shelf life. Contains Chamomile and Lavender Flower Waters and Willowbark Extract.

Amber bottle with black flip cap holds 118 ML or 4 OZ.


Ingredients/Ingrédients: Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Water, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Water, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract

name: Nipple Salve
description:
Formulated to ease nipple discomfort caused by breastfeeding. Multiuse Salve can be applied to ease sore cracked nipples, diaper rash, chapped cheeks and lips. Contains Calendula infused Grapeseed Oil, Marshmallow and Comfrey infused Olive Oil, Shea Butter, Bees Wax and Lavender - full ingredient listing is below. No fragrance has been added and special attention has been paid to ensure that Nature Nurture products do not have strong scents. Paraben free. 18 month shelf life.

Amber jar with black lid holds 30 ML 1 OZ.

Ingredients/Ingrédients: Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) infused Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Althaea Officinalis (Marshmallow) Leaf and Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf infused Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Bees Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit*, Lavender Essential Oil
*Certified Organic

name: Rich Belly Butter
description:
Formulated to ease the discomfort of stretching, itchy skin and help prevent the appearance of stretch marks. Massage this rich balm into skin twice daily throughout pregnancy. Apply to belly, breasts, hips and buttocks. Contains Organic olive oil infused with Marshmallow and Lavender, Grapeseed Oil, Shea and Mango Butters - full ingredient listing is below. No fragrance has been added and special attention has been paid to ensure that Nature Nurture products do not have strong scents. Paraben free. 18 month shelf life.

Amber jar with black lid holds 118 ML or 4 OZ. 

Contains: Althaea officinalis (Marshmallow) Leaf and Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower infused Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) infused Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Bees Wax, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit*, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil*, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil*, Chamomile Essential Oil, Geranium Essential Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) 

*Certified Organic
